Text: Hey Claudia welkome back girl.Now that u return are u going to upload tommorow or even today todays Monday episode and are u going to upload on dayli bases..?
Well, thanks for your words! I'll be posting the episodes on a daily bases, so today's episode will be posted when last week's episodes are all uploaded.

Mickey

Hi ClaudiaZ,

I'm a huge fan of Bold and the Beautiful and Young and the restless here in the UK!!! Both of these great soaps use to air here during the 90's. Then they stopped and then they aired here again 4 years ago and then last year they took it off British TV!!! They are better than the crappy British soaps!! Millions of fans here in UK were so disappointed!!! Ever since I've been downloading from you and keeping up to date with them! Thank God for you!!! Keep them coming!!
